home.specializing: Experienced product designer specializing in blockchain technology and a dedicated Product Materializer. I excel at transforming complex technical concepts into intuitive, user-friendly interfaces.

about.title: About Me

bitoDebt.title: From concept to exit: scaling chat fiction to +69% retention, +681% engagement, +136% conversion
bitoDebt.description: Transformed a business opportunity from concept to MVP to a fully scaled product. Led end-to-end design, research, and data analysis while co-driving product decisions. Expanded Zedge's product portfolio, strengthened its position in the entertainment industry, and secured the product's acquisition by a larger competitor.
businessImpacts: Increased from 22% to 100%, with 57% growth in transaction volume, user satisfaction reaching 4.6/5, becoming a stable core business
Grew from an experimental product to a core business line, accounting for 25% of total revenue
Pioneered Taiwan's first successful virtual currency debt investment product, becoming an industry benchmark
projectDescriptions: From 2 to 10+ members at various stages

ttWallet.title: TT Wallet Referral Program: Driving platform coin price up 16%, user growth 20%
ttWallet.description: To drive the development of the TT Wallet and the ThunderCore ecosystem, I designed a referral system integrated with TT Mining to ensure seamless user participation. Through data-driven and user research, I created a feature that not only promotes user growth but also enhances the liquidity of the ecosystem. Facing the complexity of business requirements and the challenge of fake accounts, my solution brought a 20% MAU growth within one month of launch and a 30% increase in user asset liquidity.
businessImpacts: Referral program launched within one month, with 5% increase in new user acquisition
Reduced 65% fake account registrations, improving ecosystem health
User asset liquidity increased by 30%, strengthening ecosystem stability
NFT reward average open rate of 87%

thunderCore.title: ThunderCore User Research
businessImpacts: Identified key user pain points leading to 35% improvement in user satisfaction
Research findings led to 25% reduction in user drop-off rate
Recommendations resulted in 40% increase in daily active users
Established new UX guidelines for blockchain applications
